pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree & Witch Hazel Face Toner 100mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree & Witch Hazel Toner gently tones and tightens pores, purifies & improves skin appearance.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree & Witch Hazel Toner helps to gently remove impurities from skin after cleansing or wearing makeup. The alcohol-free formula, tones and tightens pores without drying.

Size: 100mL

Skin Type: Dry| Normal| Oily| Sensitive

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Gently Tones and tightens the pores
• Purifies & improves skin's appearance
• Alcohol free formula
• Vegan

Warnings

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use. If sensitivity occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Polysorbate 20, Sodium PCA, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Lactate, Allantoin, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Limonene, Linalool.

Directions

Dispense a small amount onto a cotton pad and gently wipe over face after cleansing or wearing make up. For best results, use in conjunction with Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Face Wash and Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Face Cream as part of your everyday skin care regime.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
